alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 28 at 3:07AM PST until November 29 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches in the areas around Mountain City and Owyhee, with 1 to 2 inches expected along US-93. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Northern Elko County. * WHEN...From 4 AM Monday to 4 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest impacts are expected to occur along SR-225 from Wildhorse to Owyhee where a combination of blowing/drifting snow and moderate accumulation will be present for most of the period.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
